mission.title: Mission
mission.text: The Center for Scientific Consulting and Meta-Research in Biomedical Sciences (CECIMIB) is an independent center for the generation, use, and transfer of knowledge based on research and critical analysis of biomedical research. Our main goal is to provide data, trends, patterns, and diagnostics on the quality of methods, principles, and foresight of scientific activity.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Based on the originality, relevance, pertinence, and quality of our methodology, we aim to become a sustainable, accredited, and reference research center at both national and international levels, developing independent lines of research that solve specific scientific needs.

r_fundamentals.title: Fundamentals of R for Data Analysis
r_fundamentals.description: Master data analysis basics with R. This course offers a rigorous and practical introduction, designed to develop analytical competencies in biomedical research and health sciences.

r_fundamentals.title: Fundamentals of R for Data Analysis
r_fundamentals.objective_text: Develop practical skills in R for data management, data visualization, and statistical analysis. The focus is on applications widely used in scientific research, particularly within the health sciences.
r_fundamentals.certification_text: Center for Scientific Consulting and Meta-Research in Biomedical Sciences (CECIMIB).
r_fundamentals.methodology_text: Each session combines theoretical concepts with hands-on practice using pre-prepared datasets. Participants will actively apply methods and tools as they learn, ensuring immediate reinforcement of key ideas.
r_fundamentals.w1_s1_topics:
- Introduction to the course.
- Understanding the RStudio interface and basic commands.
- Introduction to data visualization.
